title: Audi Releases Dakar Racer-inspired Enduro eMTB
content:
Audi's two-wheel endeavor wisely partners with a legit eMTB brand and gets Dakar Rally car inspired graphics and 180mm of Ohlins suspension. And we kindaâ€¦
